def no_ifs_no_buts(a, b):
    return "{} is {} {}".format(a, ["{}er than".format(["great", "small"][a < b]), "equal to"][a == b], b)

def no_ifs_no_buts(a, b):
    return [[str(a) + " is smaller than " + str(b), str(a) + " is greater than " + str(b)][a > b], str(a) + " is equal to " + str(b)][a == b]
